title: Shadowlands Sector, One
description: They call me an outcast, weak.  I’ve fought my whole life for survival, running from an attack on my family I ended up hiding with the Ash Wolves. This one move might be my biggest mistake of all. And I’m the queen of mistakes…  I let them believe I’m broken, let them believe the lies. I let them believe anything they want…as long as it isn’t the truth.  There's a monster inside me, one made of teeth and claws and terrifying need. I swallow it down, hiding under the pretense of being normal. But I'm not normal. I'm anything but.  Bonding is the only thing that will save us—me and the Ash pack. Only I need someone strong enough to fight the darkness inside me…and savage enough to stay.  Will the three ruthless alphas help me...when they find out the truth of what I am?  This is a standalone shifter paranormal romance story for those who love alpha protectors, wolf shifters, and steamy scenes.
author: Mila Young
